message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I'm still interested in the product, but $13500 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to go up to $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
